Name: Dwarak Naidu
Title: Excellent for walking/jogging or cycling
Review: The track and park are by the riverfront, neat/clean and adequately maintained. Did not spot any squatters, security is adequate.

Name: Rohit B
Title: Excellent location!
Review: There couldn't be any better place than this one for a morning or an evening walk. Very peaceful and calm, and on the banks of the Gomti river, this Riverfront is very well made with good walking tracks and even a small amphitheatre. A good place to spend a nice relaxing moment here whenever in Lucknow.

Name: Rahul Sharma
Title: Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone
Review: Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone is one of the most happening places in Lucknow throughout the day. It is a place where kids love to play for hours.  Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone was developed by the Irrigation department Sharda Canal division Lucknow. The structures look artistic are world-class play equipment are Play is a critical component of child development. Besides being a foundation for learning, it is also vital for emotional, social, physical, and intellectual development.  In fact, kids who don’t get plenty of tending to develop a wide range of problems into adulthood.Play and growth are intertwined. Play is one of seven emotional systems of the human brain and on par with other human emotional instincts such as happiness, fear or love.Children’s physical, social-emotional, cognitive, and creative development is not only supported by play, it is developed through playThe World Health Organization recommends that all children and adolescents should participate in moderate to vigorous physical activity for a least 60 minutes a day. This study set out to examine the level of physical activity among the 3 to 6-year-olds during their time spent at play & physical exercisePlaygrounds have been identified as the place within parks where children spend the most energy.Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone is helping the city in children overall develop. Concepts like winning, losing, and playing fair also develop problem-solving skills. Indoor play areas give children the opportunity to socialize with others and to develop such skills. Kids engaged in regular physical activity are healthier, both physically and emotionally.Gomti Riverfront Lucknow Kids Play Zone is one of the most beautiful parks for children in India built with international quality play equipment. All the equipment is imported from Europe. Gomti Riverfront Lucknow children park is first and one of its kind children park  in-country

Name: Nilakshi S
Title: Great walk zone.
Review: Beautiful in the early morning and during sunset. Great walk zone. Well maintained. A must visit for all.

Name: krishna292
Title: An Example of  Mismanagement after Development of a Good Riverfront garden
Review: We visited this well known new tourist attraction of Lucknow, Gomti Riverfront after checking in the hotel Garden Inn on 19th March. We had earlier visited Sabarmati Riverfront in Ahmedabad and expected this newly developed riverfront to be at least comparable with that if not better, but were very much disappointed after seeing dirty and stinking water of the river and several vendors selling snacks etc. in the garden. The garden appears to be a simple case of neglect and I feel that vendors should not be allowed in side but can be provided temporary cabins to sell items outside on the road near parking area. Of course, some vendors were seen outside also but proper management was missing. The up keep of garden is also not good and water of the river was badly stinking with lots of mosquitoes all around. It could be a good place for a morning walk (when mosquitoes might not trouble the walkers), but certainly not good for picnics or evening stroll in the Riverfront park. I was also surprised to find that people inside the park were not following Covid 19 precautions. Some checks  are necessary.

Name: Khilesh C
Title: The idea of riverfront is nice but the river is smelly
Review: River front is decently made. It has cute looking chatris. Due to the barrage downstream, there is plenty of water, but there seems to be no flow in the water. Also, there is a lot of bad odour, perhaps due to drains opening in the river. We also thought it could be the untreated water being used for irrigating the greens in the park. But any which way, the foul smell was discouraging.

Name: Ajay Kacker
Title: Beautiful place for morning walks
Review: Visited the place twice for morning walk as I was staying in a nearby hotel.Place is huge and clean as a whistle.Located in close proximity of the Ambedkar park / monument, the place is an ideal place to visit with friends and family.Jogging track is separate from the walking track. Well manicured lawns with flowers and shrubs add to the scenic beauty of the place. The river itself needs to be cleaned as it appeared to be full of water hyacinth.Will definitely come again possibly at night time on next visit.

Name: mohitrastogi
Title: Nice riverfront
Review: Gomti river flows in the middle of Lucknow. The Gomti River front is nearer to Gomti Nagar Area of Lucknow. The river front is having serene look, with a few lucknow architecture type domes to sit below. There are pathways, grasslands, benches all along the river front. There needs to more development like kids playing area, entertainment type of shows, eateries, public facilities and public transport and moreover a cleaner Gomti River.

Name: Yogesh P
Title: Great view in night light
Review: The beauty of this place was very attractive in night light. Many people came for jogging here. There was local street food available.

Name: Harsh V
Title: Chill out
Review: The place is good for hang out and chill out with friends best place in gomti nagar good view but now it has 10 rupee entry fee must visit

Name: Mr traveler
Title: Modern park
Review: Modern, Clean and well maintained technically designed park ,surrounding view is good. Nature lover must visit this place. Perfect place for morning/evening walk.

Name: rohitagarwal55
Title: Nice place to spend some quality time
Review: Visited this place in the evening with family, enjoyed the pleasant weather with some bhel puri and pop corns. A good walking track to enjoy the walk. Place was clean enough though people are habitual of littering. You can enjoy your walk with some snacks as well. A good place to hang out with family and friends. Enough parking space is also available (though it is paid).

Name: DSehgal
Title: Lovely place for a walk!
Review: It is a lovely place for a walk on a pleasant evening. Though it may not be very pleasant in extreme weather, specially summers.

Name: Ashish Gupta
Title: Nice place to spend time with friends
Review: Visited last week with friends, it was 9.30pm we were 4 friends and there was very little crowd, the park is illuminated by mild colorful lighting making it looks very nice to eyes, the flow of river gomti will calm your mind, you can spend as much time you want. It feels like time has stopped we played there took plentiful pictures and enjoyed a lot.

Name: My experiences m
Title: Mesmerizing place to hang out
Review: Mesmerizing view specially in the night and morning. Nice place to hang out with family and friends.

Name: Harsh V
Title: beautiful place
Review: this place is one of the best places in lucknow i was visit the place in new year but i suggest to visit the place in evening best place for photo shoot and for couples

Name: ASHISH V
Title: Recent build new place to visit
Review: Its recent build park in lucknow. Incase you are nature lover then you can visit this place in evening for evening walk.

Name: mehtarakeshkumar56
Title: river front
Review: a well maintained park near the gomti river . the park has an entry fee and the best time to visit the river front is in evening time , since the park is lit in the evening with wow lights . quite place to relax and enjoy the environment.

Name: Akriti G G
Title: Serene Amid Chaos!
Review: Although many areas were closed, taking a drive along the riverfront in the evening and enjoying the quite away from the chaos of the city is amazing. Beautifully built and landscaped, one wishes there was more to do in the area!

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good place
Review: this is the very beautiful place at evening. you can come here with your family and friends and enjoy your time. we can also have a good time to spend the rest. And also location is very best for get a chilled relax .and best to part of this place is a awesome lighting, fountains in the river and green grass parks. Best time to visit in the evening after sun set. Celebrate birthdays. A group of people singing songs over guitar and drums. Love to visit again.

Name: Shashialabur
Title: Nice place to spend some time or exercise or just relax !
Review: I had heard about this Riverfront area but I had no idea that the walkway was so long, probably a couple of kilometers !We had the time to go there only in the evening just after sunset and the whole area was very nicely lit and made for a wonderful evening walk.The pleasant surprise was that the water in the river was very clean and there was no discernible foul smell - the city administration deserves a huge amount of praise for building this beautiful riverfront area and also to keep it so clean !A perfect place for a brisk morning / evening walk or to just hang out with friends or to spend a romantic evening with your special one !

Name: 592abck
Title: Good park and clean
Review: This is a good park and well maintained. One can spend an evening here with family and loved ones. Good food.

Name: PCVerma
Title: Gomati River Bank
Review: It was not very clean place, it should be maintained properly, good efforts made to develop the river bank, appreciable and best place for evening enjoyment.

Name: Ankita S
Title: Nice progress
Review: The view and surrounding is good. The area is kept clean. Nice place for an evening recreation. Minimal nuisance. Also the progress in development of area has been good since I last visited.

Name: Hedonist_Surya
Title: Resembling the world class parks modern Lucknow.
Review: Technically designed park with all facilities availible.Gomti river front a peaceful place to relax All you need to grab a seat in front of river view.You may opt for a river ride on eve time in specially imported boats.Fantastic view with a clean pathway on the river shores.You can easily spot it in many cinematic shots and movies etc .Security , CCTV vigilance , parking is availible here.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Newly developed beautiful riverside place
Review: This is a Newly developed beautiful riverside place which is very well maintained. This is actually technically a park and a very peaceful area. Parking is not a problem.

Name: Pramila K
Title: Gomti Riverside Park, Lucknow
Review: Beautiful and scenic place. A must visit specially when the weather is good. Lovely view of the park and city from the bridge above.

Name: ChicLifeByte
Title: A peaceful place!
Review: Gomti river front a peaceful place. Spots to sit and see the river. Lot of greenery around which makes the whole place even more beautiful. Neat and clean walking paths around

Name: BONEMAKER
Title: Surprisingly well mointauned
Review: I had gone to Lucknow for a conference and on doing a little sightseeing I was pleasantly surprised to see the River Gomti fairly clean and lots of walking paths and the well maintained Gomti river park where lots of people visit for a pleasant river side evening (although the mosquitoes are a big menace)-Belonging to Delhi and after seeing the pathetic state of the Yamuna it was nice to see a Indian city where the river is maintained (even though there is stil lot of scope for improvement to make it on par with other world cities)

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: Hangout Place !!
Review: Gomti riverfront park is a new park which has been opened in the area. However, the place needs maintenance & upkeep.

Name: Pradeep Ambat
Title: A great idea with poor follow through
Review: Vis again with parents and kid on 28 Mar 18. Mosquitoes made life difficult and overall d place was dirty with littering.Still d place is good for a one time vis provided the place is cleaned and mosquito repellant Spray is carried out once in 3 days.

Name: nugu9956
Title: RIVERFRONT
Review: Gomti riverfront is big riverfront and beautiful beautification parking facilities good river is very clean
